dk.nesos.view.text
Class BitmapFileFont

java.lang.Object
  dk.nesos.view.text.BitmapFont
      dk.nesos.view.text.BitmapFileFont

public final class BitmapFileFont
extends BitmapFont

Reads the .bff file format. This file format is used by

Codehead's Bitmap Font Generator (http://www.codehead.co.uk/cbfg)

(the fileformat specification is described in the help file)

Author:
NDHB
